appName: Vital Knights: Rise Against The Titans
displayName: Vital Knights: Rise Against The Titans
display_name: Vital Knights: Rise Against The Titans
display_long_description:
Vital Knights: Rise Against the Titans is an action-adventure game oriented towards fitness. Imagine combining fitness with fantasy!  
  
Vital Knights takes you into the world of Ela, the all mother phoenix. Her world is in chaos under the grip of powerful evil. She will need you to save it. The future of her world is in your hands.  
  
Your body is your weapon.  

Its your own vitality with which you save the world. Enter into a world ruled by ancient elemental powers. Emerge as its savior. 

The app supports more than 20 different workouts across three different modes. Test your body to its limits. 

The mixed reality design instinctively makes the player use their room space in its entirety. The challenges in game levels adapt to your environment. With compelling visuals and fascinating VFX, Vital Knights will fill your space with fantasy and transform your reality. 

For best experience ensure you have above 8x8 feet of area. Rest assured, the experience will surprise you... and exhaust you!
